contents.name: storage_type
contents.comment: The type of storage used for the asset.  This can be a local file, a url, or a blob storage reference.

contents.name: storage_path
contents.comment: Path, URI, or URL of the digital asset

contents.name: type
contents.comment: Type of asset (e.g. CAD, png, jpg, gtlf, etc.)

description: An Asset is the reference to the 2d or 3d digital asset that is the represntation of a scene or a part of a scene.
